p: The leaves of the decision tree are different among GCMs because they were structured by different variables and node numbers ( Fig 2 and S4 Fig). However, despite variation in decision tree structure, we observed general subdivision trends derived from different climate models (for example CCSM— Leaf 4, IPSL– Leaf 4 and MIROC– Leaf 3; CCSM— Leaf 14, IPSL– Leaf 20 and MIROC– Leaf 25; this kind of matching can be observed for many other leaves).
